amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B House Report 118-551 to prohibit funds to require travel or transportation under the Joint Travel Regulations for Uniformed Services to be in a zero-emission vehicle.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
